page.title: 10PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
The goodies are Police. The Invaders try to kill the Police. The Police try to catch the Invaders.
Witch In The Glue Pot You need a friend and the steps for the glue pot. One of you is the catcher. The catcher catches you and puts you in the glue pot. While the catcher is out you creep out of the glue pot and run and hide. Then the catcher has to find you.
British Bulldog You play it with a group of friends. One is in the middle and the others have to get past without the person in the middle catching them. If the person in the middle (who is It) touches you, you are "It" instead. The game ends when we go in.
